impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse . Detention deemed served by reason of time already spent in custody. Total amount enforced £700.00.
FO - Fine
Fined £400.00
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £300.00
ACON - Account Consolidated
Account to be consolidated with existing accounts. 
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 15/04/2025.
impositionOffenceDetails.title: Theft from a shop

subject: WRITE OFF ONE DAY DEEMED SERVED
